text: Alfonso M치rquez de la Plata Yrarr치zaval (19 July 1933 - 22 April 2014) was a Chilean politician, businessman and writer. He was Minister of Agriculture from 1977 until 1980. He was later the Ministry General Secretariat of Government from 1983 to 1984. He was born in Santiago. M치rquez died from pneumonia on 22 April 2014 in Santiago.
